blog_topic: ‘3수’끝에 꿈 이룬 박윤영…KT 안정화·혁신 모두 숙제

placeholders.alt: A dynamic digital artwork depicting the Korean peninsula with divided political symbols, symbolizing the current state of political division and key issues in South Korea, digital art style
A photorealistic scene of 박세현씨 saluting his father 박지만 at his 해병대 graduation ceremony, with a tearful expression and a US marine officer presenting an award, photorealistic
